hero.desc: Chatbots, agent systems, local LLMs and MLOps pipelines — from prototype to production. We deploy on your GPUs, plan infrastructure, and scale.

services.title: Full-cycle AI development
services.subtitle: From idea to production-ready system with monitoring, autoscaling and support
services.chatbotsDesc: Multi-agent systems with orchestration, RAG pipelines and connection to your databases. Telegram, Web, enterprise portals.
services.docsDesc: Generation, validation, data extraction and semantic search across documents. AI-powered document workflow automation.
services.analyticsDesc: Natural language queries to databases. Dashboards, charts, maps and analytical reports with an AI assistant.
services.mlopsDesc: Model deployment, CI/CD pipelines, drift monitoring, GPU resource planning. Kubernetes, Docker, Airflow.
services.finetuningDesc: Model fine-tuning on your data. LoRA, QLoRA, RLHF. We select the optimal base model and training strategy.
services.deployDesc: We deploy language models on your hardware. We calculate required GPUs, optimize inference, and ensure data privacy.

solutions.title: Real cases
solutions.subtitle: AI systems running in production right now
solutions.oilDesc: Electronic work permit system with multilingual LLM for document verification and risk assessment
solutions.cityDesc: Almaty city data analysis: geoanalytics, interactive maps, visualization and forecasting
solutions.chatDesc: RAG chatbots with access to corporate knowledge bases, documentation, and SQL databases

stack.title: Our stack
stack.subtitle: Proven tools for every layer of your AI system
stack.integrationsTech: FastAPI · Telegram Bot API · GitLab CI/CD · Proxmox

process.title: From idea to production
process.step1Desc: We analyze the task, calculate GPU needs, design architecture and estimate the budget
process.step2Desc: Quick MVP in 2-4 weeks with real data and feedback
process.step3Desc: Deployment with CI/CD, monitoring, logging and autoscaling
process.step4Desc: 24/7 monitoring, model updates, optimization and scaling

cta.desc: Tell us about your task — we'll evaluate the architecture, calculate resources and propose the optimal solution
